com.invoices.service

Class InvoiceService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.invoices.service.InvoiceService

  • public class InvoiceService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is annotated as a service. It is the service bean for the Invoice entity
    Author:
    psoutzis

      • convertDate

        private java.util.Date convertDate(java.lang.String datestring)
        Parameters:
        datestring - The String representing an ISO date
        Returns:
        a Date-type object, formed from the String passed as a parameter. The format of the Date returned will be: 'yyyy-mm-dd'

      • updateInvoice

        public void updateInvoice(java.lang.Long id,
                          UpdateInvoiceDTO dto,
                          Portfolio portfolio,
                          ServiceProvided serviceProvided,
                          BankAccount bankAccount,
                          Vat vat,
                          CustodyCharge custodyCharge,
                          CurrencyRates currencyRates)
        This method will set all fields of an Invoice and save it to the database. This method is used to 'update' an existing Invoice record.
        Parameters:
        id - The primary key of the record to update.
        dto - The DTO containing all fields that need to be updated.
        portfolio - The new portfolio that the invoice will have.
        serviceProvided - The new ServiceProvided that the invoice will have
        bankAccount - The new BankAccount that the invoice will have.
        vat - The new VAT rate that the invoice will have.
        custodyCharge - The new CustodyCharges that the invoice will have.
        currencyRates - The new exchange rate and currency (ies) that the invoice will have.
